translation.Already in a game: User is already in a game
translation.Sua sala foi fechada devido a ausência d: Your room has been closed due missing an opponent.
translation.Participam duas pessoas, que jogam alter: Players alternate placing Xs and Os on the game board until either opponent has three in a row, vertically or in diagonal, or all nine squares are filled.
translation.O vencedor da partida irá receber o valo: The winner of the match will receive all of their opponent's bet.
translation.O perdedor da partida terá sua quantia a: The loser of the match will have his entire bet received by his opponent.
translation.Os jogadores precisam jogar, no mínimo,: Players need to play at least one rematch to decide the winner and loser of the match. The player who leaves before playing at least one rematch will be considered the loser of the match. If another tie happens both players will have two options:
translation.Sempre que a partida se empatar novament: Whenever the match is tied again, both players must agree to play a new rematch.
translation.Caso um jogador não queira fazer outra r: In case a player does not want to make another rematch he has the option to return to the main menu without losing any value of his bet.
translation.Esse emoji é pago, clicando em comprar u: This is a paid emoji, if you click to buy a new tab will open up redirecting you to the payment
